TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit FileVersionInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 为磁盘上的物理文件提供版本信息。

span.span: Provides version information for a physical file on disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一个 16 位是数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位是数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位是数。The last 16 bits are the number. 使用方法的此类，以获取包含文件信息，然后查看有关文件信息的属性。Use the method of this class to get a containing information about a file, then look at the properties for information about the file. 属性提供有关文件的版本信息。The property provides version information about the file. ， ， ， ，和属性提供了指定的文件是的一部分的产品的版本信息。The , , , , and properties provide version information for the product that the specified file is a part of. 调用若要获取此文件的属性及其值的部分列表。Call to get a partial list of properties and their values for this file. 属性基于内置于文件的版本资源信息。The properties are based on version resource information built into the file. 版本资源通常内置二进制文件，如.exe 或.dll 文件;文本的文件不存在版本资源信息。Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information. 在 Win32 资源文件，或在程序集特性，通常未指定版本资源。Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. 例如属性反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`标记文件的中值`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`块，从生成`VERSIONINFO`Win32 资源文件中的资源。For example the property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file. 有关在 Win32 资源文件中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅"关于资源文件中"和"VERSIONINFO 资源"的平台 SDK 中。For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see "About Resource Files" and "VERSIONINFO Resource" in the Platform SDK. 有关.NET 模块中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅[设置程序集特性](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md)主题。For more information about specifying version resources in a .NET module, see the [Setting Assembly Attributes](~/docs/framework/app-domains/set-assembly-attributes.md) topic. > [!NOTE] > 此类，使在类级别应用于所有成员的链接要求。This class makes a link demand at the class level that applies to all members. A直接调用方没有完全信任权限时，将引发。A is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full trust permission. 有关链接要求的详细信息，请参阅[链接需求](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md)。For details about link demands, see [Link Demands](~/docs/framework/misc/link-demands.md). ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中的说明和版本数。Then it prints the file description and version number in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

permission.span: 直接调用方的完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 此类不能由部分受信任的代码使用。

span.span: This class cannot be used by partially trusted code.

Public ReadOnly Property Comments As String
public: property System::String ^ Comments { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取与文件关联的注释。

span.span: Gets the comments associated with the file.

value.span: 与文件关联的注释，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 。

span.span: The comments associated with the file or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性包含可用于诊断目的的其他信息。This property contains additional information that can be displayed for diagnostic purposes. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它将打印在文本框中的注释。Then it prints the comments in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一个 16 位是数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位是数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位是数。The last 16 bits are the number. 此属性获取第三个组 16 位。This property gets the third set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.FileBuildPart Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 文件版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含文件的版本号：A file version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number for a file as follows: - 第一个 16 位是数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位是数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位是数。The last 16 bits are the number. 此属性获取 16 位的第一的组。This property gets the first set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. MemberSignature.Value: public static System.Diagnostics.FileVersionInfo GetVersionInfo (string fileName);

Public Shared Function GetVersionInfo (fileName As String) As FileVersionInfo
public: static System::Diagnostics::FileVersionInfo ^ GetVersionInfo(System::String ^ fileName);

param.name: fileName
param.span: 要检索其版本信息的文件的完全限定路径和名称。

span.span: The fully qualified path and name of the file to retrieve the version information for.

summary.span: 返回表示与指定文件关联的版本信息的 。

span.span: Returns a representing the version information associated with the specified file.
A containing information about the file.

returns.span: 如果文件不包含版本信息，则 仅包含所请求文件的名称。

span.span: If the file did not contain version information, the contains only the name of the file requested.

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定文件是否包含调试信息或在调试功能启用的情况下进行编译。

span.span: if the file contains debugging information or is compiled with debugging features enabled; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性基于内置于文件的版本资源信息。The properties are based on version resource information built into the file. 版本资源通常内置二进制文件，如.exe 或.dll 文件;文本的文件不存在版本资源信息。Version resources are often built into binary files such as .exe or .dll files; text files do not have version resource information. 在 Win32 资源文件，或在程序集特性，通常未指定版本资源。Version resources are typically specified in a Win32 resource file, or in assembly attributes. 属性反映`VS_FF_DEBUG`标记文件的中值`VS_FIXEDFILEINFO`块，从生成`VERSIONINFO`Win32 资源文件中的资源。The property reflects the `VS_FF_DEBUG` flag value in the file's `VS_FIXEDFILEINFO` block, which is built from the `VERSIONINFO` resource in a Win32 resource file. 有关在 Win32 资源文件中指定版本资源的详细信息，请参阅平台 SDK`About Resource Files`主题和`VERSIONINFO Resource`主题主题。For more information about specifying version resources in a Win32 resource file, see the Platform SDK `About Resource Files` topic and `VERSIONINFO Resource` topic topics. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它显示的布尔值的状态在文本框中。Then it displays the state of the Boolean in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.IsDebug Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsPatched { get; }
.property instance bool IsPatched
Public ReadOnly Property IsPatched As Boolean
public: property bool IsPatched { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定该文件是否已修改，且不同于相同版本号的原始发行文件。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file has been modified and is not identical to the original shipping file of the same version number.

value.span: 如果该文件修补过，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the file is patched; otherwise, .

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定文件是否采用标准的发行过程生成。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file was built using standard release procedures.

value.span: 如果文件为专用版本，值为 ；如果文件是采用标准发行过程生成的或如果文件不包含版本信息，则值为 。

span.span: if the file is a private build; if the file was built using standard release procedures or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此值为`true`，将介绍此版本的文件的标准版本的不同方式。If this value is `true`, will describe how this version of the file differs from the standard version. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后在文本框中显示的专用生成信息。Then it displays the private build information in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. .property instance bool IsSpecialBuild
Public ReadOnly Property IsSpecialBuild As Boolean
public: property bool IsSpecialBuild { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指定该文件是否为特殊内部版本。

span.span: Gets a value that specifies whether the file is a special build.

value.span: 如果该文件为特殊内部版本，值为 ；反之，值为 。

span.span: if the file is a special build; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为特殊内部版本的文件使用标准的发行过程生成，但该文件不同于相同版本号的标准文件。A file that is a special build was built using standard release procedures, but the file differs from a standard file of the same version number. 如果此值为`true`、属性必须指定此文件的标准版本的不同方式。If this value is `true`, the property must specify how this file differs from the standard version. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它显示此版本是否为特殊内部版本在文本框中。Then it displays whether this version is a special build version in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. span.span: Gets all copyright notices that apply to the specified file.

value.span: 适用于指定文件的版权声明。

span.span: The copyright notices that apply to the specified file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 这应包括所有通知、 合法符号、 版权日期和等等的完整文本或`null`当文件不包含版本信息。This should include the full text of all notices, legal symbols, copyright dates, and so on or `null` if the file did not contain version information. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. MemberSignature.Value: public int ProductBuildPart { get; }
.property instance int32 ProductBuildPart
Public ReadOnly Property ProductBuildPart As Integer
public: property int ProductBuildPart { int get(); };

summary.span: 获取该文件关联产品的生成号。

span.span: Gets the build number of the product this file is associated with.

value.span: 表示与此文件关联的产品的生成号的值，当文件不包含版本信息时则为 。

span.span: A value representing the build number of the product this file is associated with or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows: - 第一个 16 位是数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位是数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位是数。The last 16 bits are the number. 此属性获取第三个组 16 位。This property gets the third set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. [!code-cpp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic FileVersionInfo.ProductBuildPart Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: A value representing the major part of the product version number or if the file did not contain version information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常情况下，版本号被显示为"主要版本号.次部件号"。Typically, a version number is displayed as "major number.minor number.build number.private part number". 产品版本号是一个 64 位数字，如下所示包含版本号：A product version number is a 64-bit number that holds the version number as follows: - 第一个 16 位是数。The first 16 bits are the number. - 下一步的 16 位是数。The next 16 bits are the number. - 16 位的第三个组是数。The third set of 16 bits are the number. - 最后一个 16 位是数。The last 16 bits are the number. 此属性获取 16 位的第一的组。This property gets the first set of 16 bits. ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后它将打印在文本框中。Then it prints the in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated. summary.span: 返回 中属性及相应值的部分列表。

span.span: Returns a partial list of properties in the and their values.

returns.span: 该类中下列属性及相应值的列表：

span.span: A list of the following properties in this class and their values:

returns.span: 如果文件不包含版本信息，则此列表将只包含所请求文件的名称。

span.span: If the file did not contain version information, this list will contain only the name of the requested file.

returns.span: 布尔值将为 ，其他所有项将为 。

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例调用获取notepad。The following example calls to get the for the Notepad. 然后，它调用要打印一份在文本框中的文件版本信息。Then it calls to print a list of the file version information in a text box. 此代码假定`textBox1`已实例化。This code assumes `textBox1` has been instantiated.
